Example run

```{r fig=TRUE,fig.width=16,fig.height=9, fig.cap="Beetle Simulations"}
set.seed(123)
par(mfrow=c(2,3),mai=c(0.2,0.2,0.7,0.1))
BeeSim$new(20)   # create 20 agents
BeeSim$drawBeetles()
BeeSim$iter()
for (i in 1:5) { BeeSim$iter() }
BeeSim$drawBeetles()
for (i in 1:10) { BeeSim$iter() ; BeeSim$mating()}

BeeSim$drawBeetles()
for (i in 1:35) { BeeSim$iter(debug=FALSE) ; BeeSim$mating(debug=FALSE)}
BeeSim$drawBeetles()
for (i in 1:35) { BeeSim$iter(debug=FALSE) ; BeeSim$mating(debug=FALSE)}
BeeSim$drawBeetles()
BeeSim$plotMonitor()
```
